Article/0-0-0-18/context.title: Context
Article/0-0-0-18/context.html:
Every function in Nullstack receives a context as the argument.<\/p>

There are two contexts, one for the client and another one for the server.<\/p>

The client context lives as long as the browser tab is open.<\/p>

The server context lives as long as the server is running.<\/p>

Both contexts are proxies that merge the keys of 3 objects:<\/p>

1 - Nullstack Context<\/a><\/h2>

These are the information that the framework makes available to you by default.<\/p>

The available global keys in both server and client are:<\/a><\/h3>
  • page<\/code><\/a><\/li>
  • project<\/code><\/a><\/li>
  • environment<\/code><\/a><\/li>
  • params<\/code><\/a><\/li>
  • router<\/code><\/a><\/li>
  • settings<\/code><\/a><\/li>
  • worker<\/code><\/a><\/li> <\/ul>

    The keys available only in server functions are:<\/a><\/h3>
    • server<\/code><\/a><\/li>
    • request<\/code><\/a><\/li>
    • response<\/code><\/a><\/li>
    • secrets<\/code><\/a><\/li> <\/ul>

      The key available only in client:<\/a><\/h3>
      • instances<\/code><\/a><\/li> <\/ul>

        2 - Application Context<\/a><\/h2>

        When you set a key to the context it will be available for destructuring at any depth of the application, even the parents of your component or 3rd party applications that mount your component.<\/p>

        Updating a key in the context causes the application to re-render automatically.<\/p>

        You can think of this as a single concept to replace stores<\/strong>, contexts<\/strong>, services<\/strong>, and reducers<\/strong> at the same time using the dependency injection pattern with vanilla JavaScript objects instead.<\/p> 

        import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  prepare<\/span>(<\/span>context<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    context.<\/span>count =<\/span> 1<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  static<\/span> async<\/span> updateTotalCount<\/span>(<\/span>context<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    context.<\/span>totalCount +=<\/span> context.<\/span>count;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  async<\/span> double<\/span>(<\/span>context<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    context.<\/span>count +=<\/span> context.<\/span>count;<\/span>
    await<\/span> this<\/span>.<\/span>updateTotalCount<\/span>(<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  render<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>count}<\/span><\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    return<\/span> (<\/span>
      <<\/span>button<\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>double}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span> {<\/span>count}<\/span> </<\/span>button<\/span>><\/span><\/span>
    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>

<\/code><\/pre>

        3 - Component Context<\/a><\/h2>
        This one contains the attributes you declare in your tag, and including:<\/p>

          

        • data<\/code><\/a><\/li>

        • self<\/code><\/a><\/li>

        • children<\/code><\/a><\/li>
<\/ul>

          If the attribute is declared in a component tag every function of that component will have access to that attribute in its context.<\/p>

          If the attribute is declared in a tag that has an event it will be merged into the event function context.<\/p>

          import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  }<\/span>

      <<\/span>button<\/span> onclick<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>this<\/span>.<\/span>add}<\/span><\/span> amount<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>1<\/span>}<\/span><\/span>><\/span><\/span>
        add {<\/span>delta}<\/span> to {<\/span>count}<\/span>

    )<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

        <<\/span>Counter<\/span><\/span> delta<\/span>=<\/span>{<\/span>2<\/span>}<\/span><\/span> /><\/span><\/span>

          Functions Context<\/a><\/h2>
          Every function of subclasses of Nullstack is injected with a copy of the instance context merged with its arguments.<\/p>

          Arguments are optional, but if declared, must be a single object with keys of your choice.<\/p>

          import<\/span> Nullstack from<\/span> 'nullstack'<\/span>;<\/span>

class<\/span> Counter<\/span> extends<\/span> Nullstack<\/span> {<\/span>

  add<\/span>(<\/span>context<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>

  }<\/span>

    this<\/span>.<\/span>add<\/span>(<\/span>{<\/span>amount<\/span>:<\/span> 2<\/span>}<\/span>)<\/span>;<\/span> // sums 2<\/span>
  }<\/span>

  async<\/span> initiate<\/span>(<\/span>context<\/span>)<\/span> {<\/span>
    console.<\/span>log<\/span>(<\/span>context.<\/span>count)<\/span>;<\/span> // 3<\/span>
  }<\/span>

}<\/span>

export<\/span> default<\/span> Counter;<\/span>
